author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hyundai Motor India Limited has signed a three-year wage agreement with the United Union of Hyundai Employees on February 17.

As per the settlement, which will be implemented with retrospective effect from April 2015, the technicians will get an average salary hike of Rs.19,000 per month spread over three years ending March 2018.

They will receive 50 per cent hike in the salary in the first year and 25 per cent each in the remaining two years.

This will mean a salary hike of Rs. 9,500 per month in the first year and Rs. 4,750 a month in the second and third year, respectively.
title: Wage pact signed at Hyundai
